subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The info command generates a listing of the proxy, cache, and resource host configurations.

subsection.name: Default
subsection.p: Unless otherwise specificed the default configuration is resolved from local:xml:dpml/transit/config. If the default configuration does not exist a classic configuration containing the DPML, Ibiblio and Apache repositories will be used.

subsection.name: Example
subsection.p: The following example demonstrates the listing of the classic configuration.
subsection.source:
